description: Take everyone's favourite Portuguese custard tart and make it giant! This gorgeous treat is sure to please with its flaky crust and cinnamon-topped custard.
name: Giant Portuguese tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line base of 24cm round pie dish with baking paper. Roll pastry out until it’s wider than dish. Press pastry into dish. Place eggs, caster sugar, cornflour and cream in a large bowl and whisk until smooth.

Combine milk and vanilla in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a simmer. Remove pan from heat. Whisk hot milk mixture into egg mixture until combined. Transfer egg mixture to pan and place over medium heat, whisking constantly for 2 minutes or until thickened. Remove pan from heat. Pour custard into pastry and smooth top. Refrigerate for 20 minutes or until a skin develops on custard.

Meanwhile, preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Bake tart for 30 minutes or until pastry is golden and custard has blackened in parts. Stand until custard is firm. Sprinkle with cinnamon sugar. Serve.
